house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1957 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1880 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Prudential Dunn, Realtors Prudential Dunn, Realtors

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
